ch.dieseite.colladaloader.asmbeans

Class Blender

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.dieseite.colladaloader.asmbeans.Blender

  • public class Blender
extends java.lang.Object

    The handler for proprietary issues. It contains static methods:

  • they work for Blender only
  • is defined in LinkingSchema.xml
  • is invoked by DataAssembler
  • doing small defined jobs
  • do not change behavior to other methods but invoke order may be important

    • This source is free; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License and by nameing of the originally author

Version:
3.1
Author:
Markus Zimmermann http://www.die-seite.ch

    • Method Detail

      • sop

        public static void sop(java.util.ArrayList<DataAssembler.Param> p)

      • parseCoordData

        public static Blender.CoordData parseCoordData(java.util.ArrayList<DataAssembler.Param> p)
        parses raw coord data from xml (polylist tag) to 'java readable' data
        Parameters:
        aPolyList - tag (entry)
        arg1 - = path to input tag semantic vertex
        arg2 - = path to input tag semantic texture coords
        arg3 - = path to float_array tag with vertex coords
        arg4 - = path to float_array tag with texture coords
        arg5 - = path to vcount tag
        arg6 - = path to p tag
        arg7 - = path to matrix tag
        Returns:
        coord raw data

      • createTriangles

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Triangle> createTriangles(java.util.ArrayList<DataAssembler.Param> p)

        creates Triangles based on this polylist. The coordinates is converted from Blender to Processing as follows: Note: convert is NOT COMPLETE: Vertex results must go through a 4x4 Matrix later

        textureProcessing x = textureBlender x * picture.width

        textureProcessing y = picture.height - textureBlender y * picture.height

        processing x = Blender x

        processing y = Blender -z

        processing z = Blender -y

        Parameters:
        1. - Raw coords (vertex+texture)
        2. - a Texture image
        3. - a Color (converted to processing)
        4. - the Collada interface
        Returns:
        a sublist for this polylist

      • createColor

        public static Color createColor(java.util.ArrayList<DataAssembler.Param> p)
        creates a Color if <color> exist converts float values from 0-1(Blender) to 0-255(processing) Note that blender put no material attribute to <lines> (stupid impl) so a dummy color is generated
        Parameters:
        a - <PolyList> tag from geometry with colorargs and transparencyArgs
        Returns:
        a color. if no valid colorargs then a dummy color is generated

      • transformShapes

        public static void transformShapes(java.util.ArrayList<DataAssembler.Param> p)
        Transforms all Vertex Coords of Lines and/or Triangles (a stupid idea of blender)
        Parameters:
        1: - ArrayList
        2: - ArrayList
        3: - CoordData

      • transform

        private static Point3D transform(Point3D vertex,
                                 float[] matrix4x4)
        Transforms a 3D Point with a 4x4 Matrix. It's assumed the Indexes [12-15] of 4x4 matrix is always 0,0,0,1
        Parameters:
        vertex -
        matrix4x4 -
        Returns:
